tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DeviceMovements (
    movement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    movement_time TIMESTAMP,
    movement_type VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id)
    REFERENCES DeviceLocations(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    location GEOGRAPHY,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE device_locations (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    recorded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE device_geofences (
    geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    geofence_name TEXT,
    latitude_center FLOAT,
    longitude_center FLOAT,
    radius FLOAT
);
